messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Food issues
messages.msgSnippet: ... Despite all the precautions you may take, stuff happens. That s the feeling I ve been getting from these food discussions too. Thank you so much for
messages.messageBody:
>>My point here is that life is just too damn short.
Despite all the precautions you may take, stuff
happens.>>

That's the feeling I've been getting from these food discussions too. Thank you so much for sharing your story. I think healthy relationships and peace in our homes and our minds are as important, if not more important, than checking on our every bite of food.

--
~Mary

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

messages.subject: Food issues
messages.msgSnippet: My point here is that life is just too damn short. Despite all the precautions you may take, stuff happens.  So TRUE. I prefer to live without fear,
messages.messageBody:
"My point here is that life is just too damn short.
Despite all the precautions you may take, stuff
happens. "

So TRUE. I prefer to live without fear, including fear of food and
what it can do. My body tells me when it needs something, and I trust
that.

Thanks for sharing your very touching story about cancer. I'm sure
it's been hard to read about Hannah. I appreciated hearing it though....

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
